IsCameraView.description: Whether the positioning of this object is used as camera position(?)

ZRotation.description: The amount this camera is rotated on the Z axis.

Distance.description: The distance this camera stays away from the player.

Yaw.description: The yaw of this camera's rotation.

Pitch.description: The pitch of this camera's rotation.

TargetOffset.description: The amount this camera's position is offset from the target's position.

GravityOffset.description: How much to offset this camera's position in the direction of the player's gravity?

PlayerOffset.description: How much to offset this camera's position from the player's position.

FollowType.description: How this camera should follow the player.

Extra.value: A simple camera which just follows the player.
